time_range.description: Over what time frame the affinities are computed. Valid values: `long_term` (calculated from ~1 year of data and including all new data as it becomes available), `medium_term` (approximately last 6 months), `short_term` (approximately last 4 weeks). Default: `medium_term`
time_range.title: Time Range

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.
limit.title: Limit

offset.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first item). Use with limit to get the next set of items.
offset.title: Offset
